products.title: Devon Stripe Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Stripes are ever popular and this devon stripe charcoal roman blind is a wonderful exponent of what stripes are all about. Thin, stylish and modern this blind will add some designer chic to any room. The colourway is great too, grey is such a modern and works beautifully with the stripes are ever popular and this devon stripe charcoal roman blind is a wonderful exponent of what stripes are all about.

products.title: Candy Stripe Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Luxurious softness meets sharp chic in this candy stripe charcoal roman blind. The crisp, clean lines of the tonal stripes are the perfect geometric touch for a modern pad, the black and white mingling in style with greys and neutrals. The fabric on the other hand is luxurious softness meets sharp chic in this candy stripe charcoal roman blind.

products.title: Ceramic Stripe Clay Grey Roman Blind
products.description: This is not just a two-tone striped blind; this is a blind that has been designed with the textured look of a piece of ceramic artwork, and lines of articulated design and character. products.title: Cardigan Stripe Flax Grey Roman Blind
products.description: In a colourway thats inspired by the great scandinavian trends, the cardigan stripe flax grey roman blind is light and airy with a stylish minimalistic approach.
